author: fmeschbe

author: elecharny
msg: Added some support for OOM protection :
- a new parameter has been added to the DirectoryServer : maxPDUSize
- it has been propagated to the LDAP decoder
- a test has been added to check that the server correctly control the PDU size.
- the server.xml file has been changed to handle this parameter

author: davsclaus
msg: minor refactor of RefComponent so it can be used as a base class for RegistryComponent. See http://www.nabble.com/Registry-Repository-support-in-CAMEL-td20774062s22882.html
